description:
Tomozaki gets a taste of the traditional overnight normie camp activities he`d always shunned as the group plots to get Izumi and Nakamura together.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Multiplayer Games Have Their Own Special Appeal
Taninzuu Play ni wa Taninzuu Play Nari no Yosa ga Aru
多人数プレイには多人数プレイなりのよさがある
